altTitles.ja: ティラノ

description.en:
Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only.

The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.
description.ja: 舞台は202X年、蒲蒲線の開通により世界有数の歓楽街となった東京大田区蒲田。 巨額の経済効果と利権に群がる反社会勢力・外国人マフィア・テロリスト、密売人、売春組織…そして政財官の黒幕の思惑…駅前の交番に赴任した新任警察官・野々上は権力の腐敗に絶望するが、「ティラノ」と呼ばれる巨躯の女性警官の圧倒的な暴力によって事件を解決していく。

altTitles.ja: 隣神ちゃんが心配

description.en:
Yano Maya, an office worker tired of work and seeking healing, met a naïve and weak God “Rinjin-chan.” This is her daily life with a God, being gently swung around and healed.  
  
Note: 'Rinjin' is a pun on '隣人' (neighbor), replacing the kanji for 'person/人' with 'god/神'.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

altTitles.zh-ro: Lang Xiaojie He Ta De Huli Meimei

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: 洒落にならないネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

altTitles.ja-ro: Share ni Naranai Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu

altTitles.en: Chilling Internet Urban Legends: A Horror Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Hontou ni Kowai Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu

altTitles.ja: 本当に怖いネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

description.en: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

title.en: Seijo ja nakatta no de, Oukyuu de nonbiri Gohan wo Tsukuru koto ni shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm Not the Saint, so I'll Just Leisurely Make Food at the Royal Palace

altTitles.zh: 反正不是聖女在王宮裏悠閒地做飯好了

altTitles.ja: 聖女じゃなかったので、王宮でのんびりご飯を作ることにしました

description.en:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace…? I’ll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!  
  
[alt. Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)

title.en: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith

altTitles.ja: アバンダンド〜強すぎて武器が壊れる勇者と武器職人のエルフ〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~

description.en: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

altTitles.ja: 着せ替え人形でchu♡

description.en: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe

title.en: Gokinjo JK Isezaki-san wa Isekaigaeri no Daiseijo

altTitles.en: The Neighborhood High School Girl, Miss Isezaki, Is the Great Saintess Returned from Another World

altTitles.ja: ご近所JK伊勢崎さんは異世界帰りの大聖女～そして俺は彼女専用の魔力供給おじさん

title.en: Lycoris Recoil Koushiki Comic Anthology: Reload

altTitles.ja: リコリス・リコイル 公式コミックアンソロジー リロード

altTitles.ja-ro: Lycoris Recoil Koushiki Comic Anthology: Reload

altTitles.en: Lycoris Recoil Official Comic Anthology: Reload
Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 魔法のつかいかた

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan wa Oshimai! Koushiki Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: Мой братик теперь не братик! Официальная комикс-антология!

description.en:

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.ja: フィルター越しのカノジョ

description.en:
Hakobe Narumi is an expressionless high schooler known as Stoney. The highlight of his unnoticeable existence is following posts from the popular selfie poster "Efa" on social media. But it turns out "Efa" is his studious and popular classmate Mitsuha Koto?! The slightly erotic, adolescent, selfie, romantic comedy between an Iron Walled Selfie girl and a stone-faced boy begins!

Note: Has both a censored and uncensored version. The censored version is what is used for the Official English release.
description.ja: つねに無表情な能面高校生・箱部成海。クラスでも存在感激うすな彼の人生の楽しみは、SNSで人気のえっちな自撮り女子「えふぁ」の投稿を追いかけること。しかし、その「えふぁ」の正体が、真面目で誰からも好かれるクラスメイトの三葉琴であることを知ってしまいーー⁉︎鉄壁自撮り女子✖️能面男子のちょっとえっちな青春自撮りラブコメ開幕‼︎
description.ru: Хакобэ Наруми — невыразительный старшеклассник по прозвищу «Каменнолицый». Его незаметное существование состоит в том, что он следит за постами популярного эротического аккаунта «Эфа» в соцсетях. Но оказывается, что «Эфа» — это его одноклассница Мицуха Кото! Начинается слегка эротическая, подростковая, селфи-романтическая комедия между селфи-девочкой с железной стеной и парнем с каменным лицом!

altTitles.ja: ××しないで！月峰さん。

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.ja:
「オレはただ…静かに過ごしたいだけなのに――…」

両親の転勤のおかげで念願の一人暮らしをはじめた高校生・陽高旭。孤独を愛する彼は学校でもトイレで一人ぼっちメシをキメていた。しかし、ささやかな平穏はひとりの少女…月峰千夜によって破られる。どこからともなく旭の元へ現れる千夜は彼の気弱さにつけこみ無茶を要求してきて!?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.th: แปลงโฉมเธอจนเจอรัก

description.en: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?
Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
description.es: Dani y Dorian han perdido el bus a la Escuela de Magia. Ahora, ellos deben encontrar a alguien que les enseñe como ser geniales y buenos hechiceros… o tal vez no.
description.ru: Однажды двое юных волшебников опоздали на Хогвартс-экс… на свой автобус в школу волшебства. Домой вернуться — прибьют, учиться самим — «гори-гори ясно, злостное колдунство» в исполнении местных совершенно немагических жителей. Не учиться совсем — быть Дэни оружием массового поражения, а ее брату Дориану остаться без прав на вождение метлой. Придется искать учителя, чтобы помог набраться ума-разума… или нет. Такого эпично сказочного прогула вы еще не видели!

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.ja: 旧・茶道部の部室を不法占拠して勝手に「ごらくぶ」の活動を続ける、悪の4人組。正義の生徒会は、ならず者どもを一掃するためについに重い腰を上げたのだった…という展開ははっきり言って全くない、まったりコミック第1巻が登場。愛が溢れまくりで、明日からも元気に生きて行けること請け合い。よ～し、パパ二度寝しちゃうぞ～!!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokuyou no Hanayome - Imikirawareta Watashi ga Reikoku Taii ni Aisareru Made

altTitles.ja: 黒妖の花嫁
黒妖の花嫁 ～忌み嫌われた私が冷酷大尉に愛されるまで～

altTitles.en: Bride of the Black Demon: How I Was Detested, Then Loved by The Ruthless Captain

description.en: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...? A love story of destiny unfolds as the hearts of a couple who have never known love melt together!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

description.en:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

title.en: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student

description.en:
Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades — the Brave Arron, the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, the Poet of the Stars Luna, and the Wise King Lysinas — were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: 君に降る言の葉は

altTitles.vi: Ngôn Từ Rơi Xuống Nơi Anh

altTitles.en: The words that falls for you

description.en:
One day, Komatsu Hinata, a book-loving high school student, meets a blond all-back-haired delinquent on the train on his way to school.
Hinata is so happy that someone is interested in his favorite novels and gets unintentionally excited, but the delinquent gives him a surprising response, and Hinata spits out terrible words at him.
Thinking that they would never meet again, he finds out that the delinquent is Igarashi Yukito, a student in the same class who has never been to school since the school started–?
A hurtful youth and love story about two people who have never known love.
description.vi:
Một ngày nọ, Komatsu Hinata, một học sinh trung học yêu tiểu thuyết, gặp một tên lưu manh tóc vàng ở tàu điện trên đường đến trường.
Hinata rất vui khi cũng có người quan tâm đến cuốn tiểu thuyết yêu thích của mình và vô tình bị kích động, nhưng cậu lưu manh lại có những lời lẽ không hay và điều đó làm Hinata tổn thương nên đã vô tình thốt ra những lời quá đáng.
Nghĩ rằng họ sẽ không bao giờ gặp lại nhau nhưng Hinata lại gặp lại tên lưu manh trên trường và hóa ra cậu lại là Igarashi Yukito, bạn cùng lớp chưa bao giờ đến trường kể từ hôm nhập học–?
Một câu chuyện tình yêu xảy đến với hai người chưa từng biết đến tình yêu.

title.en: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi Hen

altTitles.ja: 無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～ 失意の魔術師編

altTitles.en: Jobless Reincarnation ~I'll Try Seriously If I Go To Another World~ Despondent Magician Arc
Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation - Depressed Magician

altTitles.zh-hk: 無職轉生 ～到了異世界就拿出真本事～ 失意的魔術師篇

altTitles.ru: Реинкарнация безработного ~История о приключениях в другом мире~ Арка подавленного волшебника

description.en:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris…!

A more than complete manga adaptation of the seventh volume of the light novel series, depicting the aftermath of Rudeus' separation from Eris and beyond!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shirotaka](https://mangadex.org/author/38c0c039-c347-42fa-a196-3d0315451b4c)
description.ja:
エリスと別れ、失意の底に落ちるルーデウス。
行方不明の母ゼニスを捜すため、バシェラント公国、第二都市ローゼンバーグを訪れる。
自暴自棄に陥るルーデウスは、名をあげようと高ランクの依頼を一人きりで受けようとする。
しかし、ひょんなことからＢランク冒険者パーティ『カウンターアロー』と行動を共にすることに。
そのパーティメンバーにはどこかエリスの面影を感じさせるサラという少女がいて…!?

エリスと別れたルーデウスのその後を描く、原作小説７巻を完全コミカライズ!!

title.en: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)
description.ja: 野盗に村を襲われたリンは、窮地の中、１本の剣を手にする。その剣は英雄・ジークフリートの魂が宿った魔剣で、リンは圧倒的な力で野盗たちを制圧する。だが、リンの股間にはもう１本の凶悪な“剣”がそそり立っていて…!?
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

title.en: Nietzsche-sensei - Konbini ni, Satori Sedai no Shinjin ga Maiorita

altTitles.en: Mr. Nietzsche in the Convenience Store

altTitles.ja: ニーチェ先生~コンビニに、さとり世代の新人が舞い降りた~

description.en: The comedy manga follows a male part-time late-night convenience store worker named Matsukoma, and the new part-time worker he trains named Tomoharu Nii, nicknamed Nietzsche-sensei. Tomoharu is a university student in the school's Buddhism department. When an angry customer screams at Tomoharu, "Customers are gods!," he replies, "God is dead." The manga follows the part-time worker life of Matsukoma and Tomoharu, the latter of whom continuously baffles his customers and co-workers at the convenience store with his odd ways.

title.en: I became the stepmother who caused my favorite character to fall into darkness

altTitles.ja: 推しを闇落ちさせた継母になりました

description.en: Akari, who possessed the body of her favorite character's stepmother. While she was delighted to see her beloved character in their adorable childhood up close, she realized that she herself is the stepmother 'Elena,' the person responsible for causing the character to fall into darkness. Determined to avoid the character's descent into darkness and make them happy, Akari faces numerous challenges as the misdeeds of Elena before the possession come back to haunt her. Will she be able to make her favorite character happy

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Conferencia de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.es: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Cumbre de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - The Master Clans Conference Arc
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - The Master Clans Summit

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Собрание главных кланов

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 師族会議編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō-sei - Shi-zoku Kaigi-hen

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.

altTitles.es-la: El diario de crianza con el Villano

description.en: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

title.en: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~

altTitles.ja: 森で聖女を拾った最強の吸血姫～娘のためなら国でもあっさり滅ぼします！～@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~

altTitles.en: The Strongest Vampire Princess Who Found and Adopted the Baby Saint in the Forest: I'll Even Destroy a Country for My Daughter!

description.en:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today. The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?! 
 
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption. Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection. 
 
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath! The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means! 
 
A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
 
___
**Character Designer:** [Yoshimoto](https://mangadex.org/author/212b80e5-09a9-47ea-8da0-9064f16815fb)
description.ja:
『国陥としの吸血姫』という異名で恐れられる真祖・アンジェリカは、今日もひとつの国を魔法で燃やし尽くした。
その理由とは――
「マ――マ――！」
かわいすぎる娘のためだった!?
森で拾った人間の赤ちゃんを連れ帰り育てるうちに、ぷにぷにお肌や穢れを知らない純粋さにノックアウト。
平気で人殺しをする冷酷さはどこへやらで、デレデレ溺愛ライフを過ごしていた。
そんなある日、実は「聖女」という特別な存在であった娘・パールを狙い、愚かな国王が誘拐計画をしかけてきた。
これには当然怒り心頭！
容赦という言葉を忘れた「ママ」は、どんな残酷な手を使ってでも敵を殲滅する！

チートな最強吸血姫が愛ゆえに大暴れ!?
親バカダークファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: きょうのキラ君

description.en:
In 360 days, there was bright days and disappointment while I was staring at you. Though they were neighbor, Nino and Kira never talk to each other…  
  
But when Nino knows about Kira's secret, all of her life changes and her everyday becomes more interesting!  
Their link will lead them to love close to paradise.

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...?
description.ja: 冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

title.en: Moushin Listener: Yamiochi Haishinsha ni Koishite

altTitles.ja: 妄信リスナー 闇堕ち配信者に恋して

altTitles.en: Credulous Listener: Loving a Streamer Who Has Fallen to the Dark Side
Moushin Listener: Falling in Love with a Dark Streamer

description.en: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society
description.ja: 親友が人気配信者を刺殺した──。大学生の朝霧陽菜は、イケメン配信者ラビにガチ恋して狂ってしまった親友を救うため、半年前に回帰する。ところがラビはファンの愛情を搾取した末に風俗に売り飛ばすようなクズ男だった。悲劇を繰り返さないため、親友の洗脳を解くと決めた陽菜。果たして悲惨な結末を回避できるのか！？ネット社会が生み出した欲望のストーリー【クレジット】原作：西然実音ネーム・背景：もりもとキャラ線画：sno着彩：FELICO STUDIO CO., LTD.制作：Minto Studio

altTitles.ja: なんでも許してくれるお父さん
願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

altTitles.es-la: La chica hiena está destrás de mi.

altTitles.ja: ハイエナちゃんに狙われて

description.en: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
description.tr: Uzak mesafe kız arkadaşımın şehirden yaşça büyük yeni biriyle sevgili olduğunu öğrendim ve ben umutsuzluğun pençesindeyken Haibara Enako adında, diğer adıyla "Hyena-chan" olarak anılan bir kız aniden karşıma çıktı ve bana açıldı, " Erkek arkadaşım yok ve şu anda boşum."
description.pt-br: Após um término de namoro recente, nosso protagonista é abordado por Enako Haibara, também conhecida como “Hiena”…
